title: 2 Bed, Built-in desk, Vaulted ceilings
posting_body: Verona Apartments offers the utmost in Henderson living with one, two, and three bedroom apartments.
You will enjoy the renovated redesigned interiors and life-enhancing upgrades around the property.
Wood-style plank flooring, spacious floor plans, and in-home laundry options are just a few apartment features you'll love.

Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas-Polished granite kitchen countertops-Breakfast bar and built-in wine rack-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Gas log fireplace-Built-in desk-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Vaulted ceilings*-Oversized walk-in closets
